languages.text: "Мастера хладного торга. Все до одного — безнравственные преступники и отпетые негодяи. Миссия — лишь ответвление этой разбойной банды, которая сидит в {g|Encyclopedia:Calixis}Каликсисе{/g}. Впрочем, с ними можно вести дела — если соблюдать предосторожности. Главный среди них — Владайм Токара, недавно усевшийся в кресло Наместника Футфола. Конечно, он давний союзник Вольного Торговца Винтерскейла... но, впрочем, отказываться от дел с другим помазанником Императора он точно не будет. Если захотите поговорить с Владаймом — найдете его во дворце Наместника на Футфоле".

traits.locale_text: "Мастера Хладного Торга. Все до одного — безнравственные преступники и отпетые негодяи. Миссия — лишь ответвление этой разбойной банды, которая сидит в Каликсисе. Впрочем, с ними можно вести дела — если соблюдать предосторожности. Главный среди них — Владайм Токара, недавно усевшийся в кресло Наместника Футфола. Конечно, он давний союзник Вольного Торговца Винтерскейла... но, впрочем, отказываться от дел с другим помазанником Императора он точно не будет. Если захотите поговорить с Владаймом — найдете его в дворце Наместника на Футфоле".

languages.text: "Masters of the Cold Trade, immoral criminals, and notorious crooks to the last man. The Mission is but one branch of this mafia gang that has taken root in the {g|Encyclopedia:Calixis}Calixis Sector{/g}. You can do business with them as long as you take the necessary precautions. They are led by Vladaym Tocara, who recently appointed himself Liege of Footfall. Of course, he is a trusted ally of Rogue Trader Winterscale... but he will not refuse you, another of the Emperor's anointed. If you wish to talk to Vladaym, look for him in the Liege's palace on Footfall."
languages.original_text: "Мастера хладного торга. Все до одного — безнравственные преступники и отпетые негодяи. traits.locale_text: "Masers of the Cold Trade, immoral criminals and notorious crooks to the last man. Mission is but one branch of this mafia gang that took root in the Calixis Sector. You can do business with them as long as you take necessary precautions. They are lead by Vladaym Tocara who recently appointed himself the Liege of Footfall. Of course, he is a trusted ally of Rogue Trader Winterscale... But he will not refuse yet another agent of the Emperor. If you feel like talking to Vladaym, look for him in the Liege's Palace on Footfall."

languages.text: “他们是冷市贸易的主宰，每个人都是臭名昭著的骗子、犯罪分子。这个犯罪集团仅仅是扎根于{g|Encyclopedia:Calixis}卡利西斯星区{/g}的大型犯罪集团的其中一个分支。只要您提前做好必要的防范措施，就可以和这些人做生意。这群人的头目叫做弗拉迪姆·托卡拉，最近被任命为落脚港的总督。当然，他是行商浪人温特斯凯尔的忠诚伙伴……但既然您也是帝皇亲自委任的行商浪人，他不会拒绝您的要求。如果您想和弗拉迪姆谈谈的话，可以去落脚港的总督居所和他见个面。”
languages.original_text: "Masters of the Cold Trade, immoral criminals, and notorious crooks to the last man. The Mission is but one branch of this mafia gang that has taken root in the {g|Encyclopedia:Calixis}Calixis Sector{/g}. You can do business with them as long as you take the necessary precautions. They are led by Vladaym Tocara, who recently appointed himself Liege of Footfall. Of course, he is a trusted ally of Rogue Trader Winterscale... but he will not refuse you, another of the Emperor's anointed. If you wish to talk to Vladaym, look for him in the Liege's palace on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: “他们是冷市贸易的主宰，每个人都是臭名昭著的骗子、犯罪分子。这个犯罪集团仅仅是扎根于卡利西斯星区的大型犯罪团伙的其中一个分支。只要您提前做好必要的防范措施，就可以和这些人做生意。这群人的头目叫做弗拉迪姆·托卡拉，最近被任命为落脚港的总督。当然，他是行商浪人温特斯凯尔的忠诚伙伴……但既然您也是帝皇亲自委任的行商浪人，他不会拒绝您的要求。如果您想和弗拉迪姆谈谈的话，可以去落脚港的总督居所和他见个面。”

languages.text: «Son los señores del Comercio Frío, criminales amorales y rufianes sin escrúpulos, sin excepciones. La misión es solo una rama de esta mafia que se ha asentado en el {g|Encyclopedia:Calixis}sector Calixis{/g}. Mientras tome las precauciones necesarias, es posible negociar con ellos. Su líder es Vladaym Tocara, recientemente autoproclamado Señor de Paso. Es un aliado de confianza del Comerciante Independiente Winterscale... pero no rechazará a otr{mf|o|a} ungid{mf|o|a} del Emperador. Si quiere hablar con Vladaym, estará en el Palacio del Señor en Paso».
languages.original_text: "Masters of the Cold Trade, immoral criminals, and notorious crooks to the last man. The Mission is but one branch of this mafia gang that has taken root in the {g|Encyclopedia:Calixis}Calixis Sector{/g}. You can do business with them as long as you take the necessary precautions. They are led by Vladaym Tocara, who recently appointed himself Liege of Footfall. Of course, he is a trusted ally of Rogue Trader Winterscale... but he will not refuse you, another of the Emperor's anointed. If you wish to talk to Vladaym, look for him in the Liege's palace on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: «Son los señores del Comercio Frío, criminales amorales y rufianes sin escrúpulos, sin excepciones. La misión es solo una rama de esta mafia que se ha asentado en el sector Calixis. Mientras tome las precauciones necesarias, es posible negociar con ellos. Su líder es Vladaym Tocara, recientemente autoproclamado Señor de Paso. Es un aliado de confianza del Comerciante Independiente Winterscale... pero no rechazará a otr{mf|o|a} ungid{mf|o|a} del Emperador. Si quiere hablar con Vladaym, estará en el Palacio del Señor en Paso».

languages.text: 「冷たき取引の主、不道徳な犯罪者、悪名高き詐欺師たち。聖務団は、{g|Encyclopedia:Calixis}キャリクシス星域{/g}に根付いたマフィアギャングの1つの支部にすぎません。必要な措置を講じたうえで、彼らと取引することは可能でしょう。彼らはヴラダイム・トカラに率いられており、最近ではフットフォールの君主を自認しております。もちろん、彼はローグトレーダー・ウィンタースケールの信頼できる仲間ではあります…ですが、彼は皇帝に認められたあなたを拒むことはないでしょう。ヴラダイムと話をしたいのなら、フットフォールにある君主の宮殿へ向かうと良いでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Masters of the Cold Trade, immoral criminals, and notorious crooks to the last man. The Mission is but one branch of this mafia gang that has taken root in the {g|Encyclopedia:Calixis}Calixis Sector{/g}. You can do business with them as long as you take the necessary precautions. They are led by Vladaym Tocara, who recently appointed himself Liege of Footfall. Of course, he is a trusted ally of Rogue Trader Winterscale... but he will not refuse you, another of the Emperor's anointed. If you wish to talk to Vladaym, look for him in the Liege's palace on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: 「冷たき取引の主、不道徳な犯罪者、悪名高き詐欺師たち。聖務団は、{g|Encyclopedia:Calixis}キャリクシス星域{/g}に根付いたマフィアギャングの1つの支部にすぎません。必要な措置を講じたうえで、彼らと取引することは可能でしょう。彼らはヴラダイム・トカラに率いられており、最近ではフットフォールの君主を自認しております。もちろん、彼はローグトレーダー・ウィンタースケールの信頼できる仲間ではあります…ですが、彼は皇帝に認められたあなたを拒むことはないでしょう。ヴラダイムと話をしたいのなら、フットフォールにある君主の宮殿へ向かうと良いでしょう」

languages.text: "Das sind Meister des Kalthandels, unmoralische Kriminelle und berüchtigte Gauner, ohne Ausnahme. Die Mission ist nur eine Abteilung dieser Mafiabande, die ihr Hauptquartier im {g|Encyclopedia:Calixis}Calixis-Sektor{/g} hat. Ihr könnt mit ihnen Geschäfte machen, solange Ihr die erforderlichen Vorsichtsmaßnahmen trefft. Angeführt werden sie von Vladaym Tocara, der sich kürzlich selbst zum Lehnsherrn von Footfall ernannt hat. Natürlich ist er ein enger Verbündeter von Freihändler Winterzunder ... aber er wird Euch nicht abweisen, immerhin seid Ihr ebenfalls vom Imperator gesalbt. Solltet Ihr mit Vladaym sprechen wollen, findet Ihr ihn im Palast des Lehnsherrn auf Footfall."
languages.original_text: "Masters of the Cold Trade, immoral criminals, and notorious crooks to the last man. The Mission is but one branch of this mafia gang that has taken root in the {g|Encyclopedia:Calixis}Calixis Sector{/g}. You can do business with them as long as you take the necessary precautions. They are led by Vladaym Tocara, who recently appointed himself Liege of Footfall. Of course, he is a trusted ally of Rogue Trader Winterscale... but he will not refuse you, another of the Emperor's anointed. If you wish to talk to Vladaym, look for him in the Liege's palace on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Das sind Meister des Kalthandels, unmoralische Kriminelle und berüchtigte Gauner, ohne Ausnahme. Die Mission ist nur eine Abteilung dieser Mafiabande, die ihr Hauptquartier im Calixis-Sektor hat. Ihr könnt mit ihnen Geschäfte machen, solange Ihr die erforderlichen Vorsichtsmaßnahmen trefft. Angeführt werden sie von Vladaym Tocara, der sich kürzlich selbst zum Lehnsherrn von Footfall ernannt hat. Solltet Ihr mit Vladaym sprechen wollen, findet Ihr ihn im Palast des Lehnsherrn auf Footfall."

languages.text: « Les maîtres du Commerce Froid, des criminels amoraux et des escrocs notoires, tous autant qu'ils sont. La Mission n'est que l'une des branches de cette mafia qui a pris racine dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Calixis}secteur Calixis{/g}. Tant que vous prenez les précautions nécessaires, rien ne vous empêche de faire affaire avec eux. Ils obéissent à Vladaym Tocara qui s'est récemment arrogé le titre de suzerain de Castel. C'est évidemment un fidèle allié du libre-marchand Winterscale... mais il ne refusera pas de servir les intérêts d'{mf|un autre porteur|une autre porteuse} d'une lettre de marque remise par l'Empereur. Si vous souhaitez vous entretenir avec lui, allez le trouver dans le palais du suzerain, à Castel. »
languages.original_text: "Masters of the Cold Trade, immoral criminals, and notorious crooks to the last man. The Mission is but one branch of this mafia gang that has taken root in the {g|Encyclopedia:Calixis}Calixis Sector{/g}. You can do business with them as long as you take the necessary precautions. They are led by Vladaym Tocara, who recently appointed himself Liege of Footfall. Of course, he is a trusted ally of Rogue Trader Winterscale... but he will not refuse you, another of the Emperor's anointed. If you wish to talk to Vladaym, look for him in the Liege's palace on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: « Les maîtres du Commerce Froid, des criminels amoraux et des escrocs notoires, tous autant qu'ils sont. La Mission n'est que l'une des branches de cette mafia qui a pris racine dans le secteur Calixis. Tant que vous prenez les précautions nécessaires, rien ne vous empêche de faire affaire avec eux. Ils obéissent à Vladaym Tocara qui s'est récemment arrogé le titre de suzerain de Castel. C'est évidemment un fidèle allié du libre-marchand Winterscale... mais il ne refusera pas de servir les intérêts d'{mf|un autre porteur|une autre porteuse} d'une lettre de marque remise par l'Empereur. Si vous souhaitez vous entretenir avec lui, allez le trouver dans le palais du suzerain, à Castel. »

languages.text: "Soğuk Ticaret'in pirleri, ahlaksız suçlular ve adı çıkmış bir dolandırıcı sürüsü. Misyon, {g|Encyclopedia:Calixis}Calixis Sektörü'nde{/g} kök salmış mafya çetesinin yalnızca bir kolu. Gerekli önlemleri aldığınız sürece onlarla iş yapabilirsiniz. Başlarında, kendisini kısa süre önce Binliman Emîri ilan eden Vladaym Tocara var. Hür Tacir Winterscale'in güvenilir bir müttefiki olsa da İmparator'un kutsadıklarından olan sizi de reddetmeyecektir. Vladaym'la konuşmak isterseniz kendisini Binliman'da, Emîr'in sarayında bulabilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "Masters of the Cold Trade, immoral criminals, and notorious crooks to the last man. The Mission is but one branch of this mafia gang that has taken root in the {g|Encyclopedia:Calixis}Calixis Sector{/g}. You can do business with them as long as you take the necessary precautions. They are led by Vladaym Tocara, who recently appointed himself Liege of Footfall. Of course, he is a trusted ally of Rogue Trader Winterscale... but he will not refuse you, another of the Emperor's anointed. If you wish to talk to Vladaym, look for him in the Liege's palace on Footfall."

Vladaym'la konuşmak isterseniz kendisini Binliman'da, Emîr'in sarayında bulabilirsiniz."
